about_the_game:
Welcome to Blocker Library!
You awaken in the eerie confines of the Blocker Library, a place tainted by the malevolent history of the Blocker family. As you delve into the library's floors, each more terrifying than the last, you must decipher puzzles and confront uniquely horrifying monsters to escape each level.


Lighter
Your trusty lighter serves as your source of limited light, a feeble flame warding off the encroaching shadows.


Gun
You will find some weapons. Scarce bullets serve as your only defense against lurking horrors.


The Story
Elizabeth, the family's matriarch, subjected her daughter Elena to a nightmarish upbringing. With each terrifying story she read, Elena's innocence was stripped away, replaced with growing darkness. Meanwhile, the family's patriarch, Mr Blocker, was imprisoned by Alzheimer's, a helpless spectator to the horrors unfolding around him.

Elizabeth's madness reached its zenith when she began conducting horrific experiments on unwilling victims in the library's grim basement. She forced Elena to witness these atrocities until, one fateful day, Elena herself underwent a monstrous transformation, becoming the very embodiment of the library's sinister essence.

In a brutal act of retribution, Elena turned on her deranged parents, ending their reign of terror. She liberated the enslaved monsters, once human, twisted by Elizabeth's experiments. Now, you find yourself trapped in this nightmarish realm. Your only hope lies in deciphering the library's cryptic puzzles and confronting its grotesque inhabitants.


----
Dark Pages' is a chilling blend of horror, first-person shooting, and puzzles, where your wits and courage will be pushed to the brink. Can you escape this living nightmare or become yet another dark chapter in the Blocker Library's grim history?

name: Dark Pages

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can adjust settings to fit your needs.

short_description: Descend into the depths of the Blocker Library, a place where darkness and terror intertwine. Solve puzzles, confront unique and horrifying monsters, and uncover the chilling story of this establishment. Will you find a way out, or will you become another dark page in this twisted tale of horror?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
